title: Unlock my phone
content: I just bought this phone (google pixel 4xl) at ebay, I checked its status on google repair and found it to be an unlocked phone, but when I inserted the sim to use it said "SIM Card isn't supported ... Ask Xfinity Mobile if this device can be unlocked ". Please let me know how I can use this phone?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
